worng_syntax_password: Make Sure Your Password is between 6 and 50 Characters Long. It Must Have at Least One Non-Alphanumeric Character, at Least One Digit ('0'-'9'), at Least One Lowercase('a' - 'z') and at Least One Uppercase('A' - 'Z')

select_branch_note:
